at.tugraz.ist.cc.debug

Class DebugGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.tugraz.ist.cc.debug.DebugGenerator

  • public class DebugGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to generate and print a debug table for assignment 2 (type checking).
    Author:
    ccfuntime

    • Method Detail

      • addVariableTCDebug

        public void addVariableTCDebug(int line,
                               java.lang.String id,
                               java.lang.String type,
                               java.lang.String class_id,
                               java.lang.String method_id,
                               java.lang.String... param_types)
        Adds variable informations for type checker debug to var_debug_str using a format String and the given var_debug_format. If the variable is a member variable (this is, it is not defined inside a method scope) method_id should be an empty String and no param_types have to be passed.
        Parameters:
        line - line number where the variable is defined in the source code
        id - the variable's ID
        type - the full name of the variable's type
        class_id - the full name of the class associated with the variable
        method_id - the full method name in which the variable has been defined
        param_types - an array of strings with the full names of the parameter types of the aforementioned method

      • addOperatorTCDebug

        public void addOperatorTCDebug(java.lang.String operator,
                               java.lang.String lhs_type,
                               java.lang.String rhs_type,
                               java.lang.String result_type,
                               int line,
                               java.lang.String op_string)
        Adds information about an operator for type checker debug to op_debug_str. For unary operators/return/conditions lhs_type is expected to be an empty String. The op_string should contain the whole expression (including potential subexpressions).
        Parameters:
        operator - the operator symbol (e.g. "+", "==", "return")
        lhs_type - the full name of the left-hand side operand's type
        rhs_type - the full name of the right-hand side operand's type
        result_type - the full name of the operator's resulting type
        line - line number where the operator occurs in the source code
        op_string - the source code of the whole expression

      • printTCDebug

        public void printTCDebug()
        Prints the type checker debug Strings (var_debug_str, op_debug_str) to standard out in a formatted way. In addition resets var_debug_str and op_debug_str to an empty String.

        Please watch youtu.be/dQw4w9WgXcQ if you feel like this framework has let you down.
